item.title: Faceless Sports Youtube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and creative video editor to join our team and produce engaging faceless sports videos for our YouTube channel. The ideal candidate will be passionate about sports, possess strong editing skills, and have experience creating content that captivates and entertains viewers.

**Responsibilities:**

- Create 8-10 minute faceless sports videos featuring highlights, top lists, player profiles, analysis, and commentary.
- Use a variety of video clips, images, and graphics to craft visually appealing content.
- Edit videos to ensure smooth transitions, clear audio, and high-quality visuals.
- Incorporate background music, sound effects, and voiceovers as needed.
- Research and gather content to ensure videos are accurate, up-to-date, and relevant.
- Collaborate with the team to develop new video ideas and concepts.

**Requirements:**

- Proven experience in video editing and production.
- Proficiency with video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar.
- Strong understanding of sports, including current events and popular trends.
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
- Creative mindset with an eye for detail and quality.
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

**Preferred Qualifications:**

- Experience creating content for YouTube or other social media platforms.
- Knowledge of YouTube SEO and best practices for video creation.
- Ability to create compelling thumbnails and titles.

If you are a sports enthusiast with a knack for video editing and a desire to create exciting, faceless sports content, we would love to hear from you! Please provide examples of your previous work when applying.

Budget: $10
Posted On: June 24, 2024 19:07 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:YouTube Development, YouTube, YouTube Marketing, Sports & Recreation, Video Production, Video Editing
Skills: YouTube Development, YouTube, YouTube Marketing, Sports & Recreation, Video Production, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Creative Strategist - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for a creative stategist that can:
Goal: Create at least 100 new video and static ads monthly
- Look at competitors ads
- Instruct and provide content to our editors and designers
- Be ultimately responsible for creating new ads daily
- Hire UGC on Upwork or other platforms to creat content
- Get Stock videos and ad examples to give our team
Make sure we are creating great ads with different hooks daily
The pay is monthly, only apply if you are comfortable working in a team and instructing other people or even do the editing and design yourself for extra pay, we always give profit share when ads perform organically or with paid

Budget: $500

item.title: Social media content creator and tiktok video editor - Upwork
item.description:
Job Overview:
We are seeking a creative and dynamic Social Media Content Creator and TikTok Video Editor to join our team. This role requires a blend of creative storytelling, video editing skills, and an understanding of social media trends, particularly on TikTok. The ideal candidate will be responsible for creating, editing, and publishing content that enhances our brand’s presence and engages our target audience.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and curate engaging content for our social media platforms, focusing on TikTok, but also including Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter.
- Edit and produce high-quality video content that aligns with our brand’s voice and aesthetic.
- Collaborate with the marketing team to create innovative content strategies.
- Monitor social media trends and utilize them to develop content ideas.
- Analyse performance metrics and optimise content based on data insights.
- Engage with our community by responding to comments and messages.
- Ensure all content is on-brand, consistent in style, quality, and tone.

**Qualifications:**
- Proven experience as a Content Creator or Video Editor, with a strong portfolio of work.
- Expertise in TikTok content creation and understanding of the platform’s best practices.
- Proficient with video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro).
- Excellent storytelling skills with the ability to convey messages creatively and effectively.
- Strong understanding of social media metrics and SEO principles.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
- Excellent time management skills and ability to meet deadlines.
- Degree in Media Studies, Communication, or related field is preferred.

What We Offer:
- A vibrant and inclusive company culture.
- Opportunities for professional growth and development.
- Competitive salary and benefits package.
- Flexible working hours and remote work options.



Hourly Range: $5.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 19:05 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Marketing, TikTok, Social Media Advertising, Social Media Content Creation, Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, Video Editing, Social Media Management, Content Creation
Skills: Social Media Marketing, TikTok, Social Media Advertising, Social Media Content Creation, Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, Video Editing, Social Media Management, Content Creation
Country: Bangladesh
click to apply

item.title: Graphic Designer for Sports Brand (Social media focus) - Upwork
item.description:
Role Description

This job posting is for a part-time graphic design role at Field Vision Sports, LLC. As our primary graphic design.  As a graphic designer, we will be looking for this person to help create the following assets: 1) Socialz media templates that bring the brand to life.  2) Social media assets (instagram, tiktok, and potentially TikTok depending on skillset), 3) A creative direction for  website content. 4) Graphics to support stories on Fieldvisionsports.com.  This is not a full-time position, but we are looking for someone who can work regularly with the team on a week-to-week basis for between 20-30 hours/per week.

Company Description

Field Vision Sports, LLC is a company dedicated to using cutting-edge algorithms, machine learning, and advanced technologies to revolutionize the analysis, understanding, and prediction of the game of football. We aim to bring the vision of the game's elite into the palm of your hand, providing unique opportunities for fans and professionals alike.

Qualifications

Strong graphic design skills
Experience creating assets that can be easily leveraged across social media platforms (i.e. Instagram, X, tiktok)
Experience creating easily digestable graphics out of data
Knowledge & passion for the Football a plus.
Ability to do video editing a plus.
Ability to work 20-35 hours per week

Hourly Range: $25.00-$60.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 18:54 UTC
Category: Graphic Design
Skills:Custom Graphics, Infographic, Sports & Recreation, Statistical Infographic, Graphic Design, Instagram, Social Media Imagery, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Logo Design
Skills: Custom Graphics, Infographic, Sports & Recreation, Statistical Infographic, Graphic Design, Instagram, Social Media Imagery, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, Logo Design
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Music Video Style IG Reels and Photo Editing - Upwork
item.description:
Trial Project for a longer term on-going engagement:

We are looking for a talented individual to create three music video style Instagram (IG) reels and edit 18 photos to enhance color and contrast. This first one will be of one of the artists. The final product should be professional event style photos that capture the essence of Reggaeton Music. This gig requires creativity, attention to detail, and proficiency in video editing and photo editing software. The selected candidate should be able to understand our vision from example content deliver high-quality content that aligns with our vision.

Skills required:
- Video editing
- Photo editing
- Color correction and grading
- Contrast enhancement
- Someone who can take general instructions and turn our vision into reality.

HOW TO APPLY:

Please submit a sample reel of 90 seconds following these instructions the best submission will win the job:

- Saturation and color grading needs to look consistent thorough the clips

1. 5 0:67 second clips of the artist El Blejo clipped together showing the lead up to the event. We want to build some anticipation. Use the Daddy Yankee clip as part 1 for inspiration without the stadium shots.. We want to create a bit of a build up showcasing some social shots walking towards the event and stage and then show case the artist themselves.
2. The remaining 87 seconds should be a mix of audience shots with the artist performing of 1-2 seconds long capturing the vibe of the event and the music. On camera 2 the focus is good for parts of the video clips but it's not perfect, please use the parts of the clips where the focus is accurate.

Content to edit:
https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fo/tx3uxa8bfrh74fq17pfsj/ACgdRdnEsp5H8KL6ZqUQIBQ/1.%20BLEJO?dl=0&rlkey=n9rqt006zz89d8i6ibhwq1fb3

Please use this reel as inspiration for what we are looking for, we do not have stadium shots but this was a good example of build with a performance:

Example #1:
https://www.instagram.com/reel/Cj388c1jORq/?igsh=a2NxNjg5anJha2Rh

Size: Small
Duration: Under 1 month
Expertise: Intermediate

Budget: $40
Posted On: June 24, 2024 18:39 UTC
Category: Image Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Music Video
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Music Video
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Youtube video editor needed! - Upwork
item.description:
Hi ! This is a job repost!

My name is Daniela, and I am a YouTuber (Susy0926) who creates gaming/reaction videos and occasional vlogs.

I am currently looking for a dedicated video editor who can commit to working with me for the long term, ideally for a monthly fee. The work would be consistent, with about two videos per week needing edits. I highly value consistency, good communication, and a genuine interest in the content we create.

We can discuss pricing and any other questions you may have about the job. If you're interested, please feel free to message me so we can explore this opportunity further.

I look forward to hearing from you!

Best,
Daniela

item.title: Animation for Cooking Show Opening Sequence - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented animator to create the opening sequence for a new cooking show demo. The show features teams competing to prepare the best dinner, and the studio is a vibrant, colorful space divided into two apartments – one for each team. The competition includes time-limited shopping and cooking activities within the studio, which also houses a grocery store.\

We are on a tight schedule, though, so we need someone that could make ti happen in the next 10 days.

Responsibilities:

Develop a dynamic and engaging opening sequence that sets the tone for the cooking competition.
Incorporate elements inspired by the colorful and lively studio environment
Use visual elements such as plates, cookware, food, clocks/timers, shopping carts, etc., to enhance the sequence.
Integrate the show’s logo at the end of the sequence.
Sync the animation with the provided demo jingle (39 seconds long, potential for shortening).


Budget: $550
Posted On: June 24, 2024 18:34 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: Serbia
click to apply

item.title: TikTok Comedy Writer - Upwork
item.description:
**MUST READ JOB DESCRIPTION**

The Skorys is a vibrant and dynamic family of creators who produce engaging, entertaining, and family-friendly, relatable content on TikTok. We specialize in comedy and storytelling, bringing laughter and joy to our audience. We pride ourselves on creating unique and relatable content that stands out in the TikTok community. Our mission is to spread positivity, humor, and creativity through our videos, and we are looking for a talented TikTok Comedy Writer to join our team and help us achieve this goal.

Responsibilities:

Develop and write 2-3 original comedy sketches per week tailored specifically for TikTok.

Collaborate closely with The Skorys team to brainstorm, refine, and execute content ideas. (This would be a mix of coming up with your own/taking ideas from the team and scripting them out)

Stay up-to-date with TikTok trends, challenges, and viral content to incorporate into our sketches.

Write scripts that align with The Skorys' brand voice and humor style, ensuring content is family-friendly and engaging.

Optimize content for TikTok’s algorithm to maximize reach, engagement, and follower growth.

Requirements:

Proven experience in writing comedy, particularly for short-form video platforms like TikTok, Shorts Or reels.

Deep understanding of TikTok’s algorithm, trends, and audience engagement strategies.

Strong sense of humor with the ability to write for a family-friendly audience.

Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively with a creative team.

Familiarity with The Skorys' content, style, and brand voice.

Creative and proactive mindset with a passion for social media.

Preferred Qualifications:

Previous experience writing for popular TikTok creators or similar platforms.

A portfolio showcasing successful TikTok sketches or similar short-form video content.

Understanding of video production and editing basics to enhance storytelling.

Ability to generate fresh, innovative ideas that resonate with audiences.

Application Process:

To apply, please send the following:

Your resume highlighting relevant experience.

A brief cover letter explaining why you would be a great fit for The Skorys.

Examples of your previous work, specifically any TikTok sketches or short-form comedy content.

A short explanation (no more than 300 words) of why we should choose you for this role and what makes you the perfect fit.

Some examples of our style
https://www.tiktok.com/t/ZPREjKSg7/
https://www.tiktok.com/t/ZPREjgmf1/
https://www.tiktok.com/t/ZPREj7GAu/


Hourly Range: $15.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 18:30 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Create a YouTube Video Introduction - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for someone to create a brief (approximately ten second) introductory clip for my videos that I will be posting onto my YouTube channel.  

I have a thorough idea of what I'm looking for, so applicants must be able to follow instructions, handle feedback and communicate quickly and effectively.  

In addition to the agreed compensation, I will also give the artist a shout-out on every video in which the animation is used (if requested).

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 24, 2024 18:26 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, MP4, MOV, Fantasy, Science Fiction, Video Editing, Video Intro & Outro, Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics, 2D Animation

item.title: TikTok editor needed for influencer posts - Upwork
item.description:
Hello, I am a content creator and need someone to edit my content into TikToks.

The videos need to be in this style: vm.tiktok.com/ZIJnW1wGr/

I will provide you with the video files and it will be up to you to edit them.


In order to apply for this job, you will need to submit ONE sample of your work using one of my videos. You can pick any one you want. These are raw files that I recorded with no editing, it's your job to edit them with the above style.

You must edit them in the style as close to that as possible. Please remember to remove any ums and uhhs, gaps in the audio, etc so that the clip flows SMOOTHLY. Please do any color correction/volume that any video requires.

drive.google.com/drive/folders/1kKP2abqMcD-t-6HKjMD9TsyKsISDkCif?usp=sharing

And if you have additional samples please feel free to submit them as well.

I am looking for 2-3 editors.

Thank you.


Posted On: June 24, 2024 18:23 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:CapCut, Video Editing, Instagram Reels, TikTok Video, Social Media Marketing, Video Editing & Production
Skills: CapCut, Video Editing, Instagram Reels, TikTok Video, Social Media Marketing, Video Editing & Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Videographer for Testimonial Video - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

My name is Micah Smith, and I am the owner of StarMade Production, a Christian-based video production company located in Houston, Texas. Here is our website: https://www.starmadeproduction.com/

We are currently working on a testimony video for Savannah Pastor, Jeff Dawsey, and are exploring our options for the best approach. Specifically, we are considering either traveling to Savannah to shoot the video ourselves or hiring a local freelancer to handle the shoot. This would help save on budget costs and allow us time to work on the re-enactment scenes in Houston.

If you are interested and have experience in shooting testimony or interview-style videos with quality audio, lighting, 4k video, and slight b-roll, we would love to hear from you! Having two cameras to capture both medium and close-up shots is a significant plus!

For more information about our testimonial service for Jeff, please take a look at our Instagram post: https://www.instagram.com/p/C8PSoXLivPE/?utm_source=ig_web_button_share_sheet&igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA==.

We are looking to have this shot sometime in July, currently scheduled between July 8-12. Please let me know if this date works for you or if you would need to move it to a later date!

Feel free to reach out with any questions. I look forward to seeing your submissions!

(Please submit a portfolio or link showcasing your previous work, and your list of equipment to be considered!)

Hourly Range: $50.00-$70.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 18:20 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Video Production, Testimonial Video, Sound Design
Skills: Videography, Video Production, Testimonial Video, Sound Design
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Animation YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Seeking a talented video editor to create engaging content for my cash cow YouTube channel. The video style we are looking for is animation, so experience in this area is essential. As a video editor, you will be responsible for editing and enhancing raw footage, adding animations, effects, and transitions to create visually appealing videos. Attention to detail and creativity are key in this role. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of video editing software, such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro, and possess excellent communication skills.  Please review this channel and apply only if you can create this type.
https://www.youtube.com/@easyactually

Skills required:
- Video editing
- Animation
- Adobe Premiere Pro
- Final Cut Pro
- Attention to detail
- Creativity

Budget: $500
Posted On: June 24, 2024 18:19 UTC
Category: Cartoons & Comics
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Motion Graphics
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Motion Graphics
Country: United Arab Emirates
click to apply
